screen:
-= Info about function 'CHANNELS' =-
[Syntax] CHANNEL([regular expression])
[Synopsis] Gets the list of channels, optionally filtering by a regular expression.
[Description] Gets the list of channels, optionally filtering by a regular expression. If no argument is provided, all known channels are returned. The regular expression must correspond to the POSIX.2 specification, as shown in regex(7). The list returned will be space-delimited.
